metadata.description: Agent skills for INTDEV open source tools

plugins.name: intdev-tools
plugins.description: Core development skills for building with INTDEV's open source stack: nextjs-sass-starter scaffolding, SRCL (Sacred Computer) components, Server Mono typography, INTDEV brand guidelines, and api.internet.dev integration

plugins.name: intdev-ops
plugins.description: Operational skills for deploying, maintaining, and planning work on INTDEV projects: deployment patterns, WCAG accessibility compliance, and Daedalus AI planning with Talos agent orchestration
